roleset.name: stretch excessively

role.descr: agent, or cause of something overstretching

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT, phase 1, part 3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Adjectival Usages
example.text: Surely with the amount of unrest in the Middle East it is the wrong time to so savagely cut our already overstreached armed forces .
